'''''Amon Hen'' 81''' is the eighty-first issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in September [[1986]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[Nazgûl|Nazgul]]''
** By: Neil Loughran
* Contents
* Editorial
** By: Iwan Rhys Morus
* Back Issues & Badges
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Anne Haward
* Reviews
** By: Iwan Rhys Morus, [[John Ellison]], Simon Barclay, Gwyneth Morgan, Colin Michael Tucker, Mike Towers, Colin Rosenthal
* Art Review
** By: [[John Ellison]], [[Christina Scull]]
* Summermoot Report
** By: Martin Smith
* Artwork: ''Dunlending''
** By: Simon Jacob
* Textual Emendations in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
** By: [[John Ryan|J.S. Ryan]]
* The Breaking of Frodo II
** By: [[Alex Lewis]]
* Artwork: ''All shall love me and despair''
** By: Ley Holloway
* Publicity Page
** By: Howard Rosenblum
* Tolk Folk
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* Letters
* Anne's Allsorts
** By: Anne Haward
* Small Press
** By: Anne Haward
* Back Cover
